attributes.action: Consider Free Prescriptions for Asthma Suffers as this is a life threatening Condition like any other
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Asthma suffers should be given free Medication on the NHS as Asthma is a life threatening condition just like any other, Asthma is on the rise Public attention in the developed world has recently focused on asthma because of its rapidly increasing prevalence, affecting up to one in four urban children yet we are neglected when It come to free medication, where as Smoking is a self inflicted condition yet they are given help and free patches, Gum and Inhalers to help them quit unlike Asthma suffers who receive no such help.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to " Consider Free Prescriptions for Asthma Suffers as this is a life threatening Condition like any other."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23024


Prime Minister's Office
